name: The Monarch-y
description: The Monarch-y is made of two tantalizing wings. One, a goldilocks goddess, who fans ‘butterfly betas’ of blue & gold from her bodice. The other a mocha-haired heiress who touts the Queen of the Flies on her head to fan her body. They morph together to form the supreme #InstaHottie. The Queens of your Screens. The Monarchs of Top Models. Both bombshells, one blonde and one brunette. Dare you separate the Twinfluencer set? For jimmy and his choo told me there could be only two, it’s true. No room for a triplet in this double threat. Turn up the sound to hear the anthem the beat of their shoes pound. Can they stand alone—or will their fame be dethroned?...Leaving the @Monarch-y in anarchy. What will become of their 12.7 million followers? One click could swallow Her. Separate, they could melt like Butter. Together, they Fly. Will the torrent winds of their separation of power suck them back into their cocoons? Or will they turn from butterflies to baboons? Who will remind them, they were once mere caterpillar? You hold the key to the end of this royal haute thriller…
